document_data.name: Sarunn Thoon
document_data.nicknames: Witch of the Far Cold Hill
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarunn Thoon''' was a [[sorceress]] that ruled over [[Farkeep]] for a time during the [[Age of Humanity]].
document_data.Personality: She was known as an especially cruel and cunning individual.
document_data.History:
Sarunn took control of the [[Far Hills]]' fortress by posing as a weak captive, and entering into the bedchamber of its lord, a man known only as the [[Wolf Knight]]. She took over rule of the keep for herself, for a time, proving to be far more malevolent than its previous lords.

The evil sorceress' reign was put to an end however, when she and all of her followers were mentally enslaved by a group of [[illithid]]s that posed as enigmatic, masked [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Sarunn's story was outlined in the ballad known as ''[[The Witch of the Far Cold Hill]]''.
